page.title: 08Employment
page.content: Thw most interestiung feature of our survey ,was that the largest industrial operator was not well featured.The other most striking factor was the variety of occupations.However the sadest feature of the sample was the number of unemployed adults.In our sample this consisted of nearly twenty percent.The largest number in employment were involved in the building trade,carpenters,and builders.Apart from this no other group was particularly featured.Other occupations were,butcher,carsalesman,computer programer,publican,quarryman,greengroc er,secretaries,knitwearworkers,cleaner s,shopassistants,and,waterboard official.This list is not complete.However it does give an indication of the types of employment.
